unnormalised: Arrey yaar, cart abandonment? It's like promising your amma you'll clean your room by Diwali (10/11/2024) and then...poof! Gone with the wind! We get it, life happens. Maybe that saree for Bindiya's wedding looked better at 3 AM after that second chai. Come back, we're offering a coupon, valid till 6 PM, 22/10/2024. Don't leave us hanging like a dahi handi, ok?
normalised: Arrey yaar, cart abandonment? It's like promising your amma you will clean your room by Diwali (tenth november two thousand and twenty four) and then...poof! Gone with the wind! We get it, life happens. Maybe that saree for Bindiya's wedding looked better at three A M after that second chai. Come back, we are offering a coupon, valid till six P M, twenty second october two thousand and twenty four. Do not leave us hanging like a dahi handi, ok?
